title: Add PDF translator with language conversion and alignment

requirements.text: Implement PDF translator feature that converts PDF documents from one language to another language while preserving the original document layout and alignment

quotes: can you also add pdf translator to convert one language pdf to another language pdf with proper alignment

acceptanceCriteria: User can upload a PDF file for translation
User can select source and target languages from a dropdown or language picker
Translation preserves the original PDF layout, formatting, and alignment
Translated text maintains the same positioning as the original text
System generates a new translated PDF file that can be downloaded

requirements.text: Display a prominent disclaimer message 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' on the PDF translator page to inform users about translation limitations

quotes: it also need to add discription " Images that includes text may not translated properly"

acceptanceCriteria: Disclaimer text 'Images that include text may not be translated properly' is clearly visible on the PDF translator page
Disclaimer appears before or during the translation process
Disclaimer uses appropriate styling to draw user attention (e.g., info banner or warning message)

requirements.text: Add PDF Translator navigation item to the homepage and main navigation menu alongside existing PDF tools
acceptanceCriteria: PDF Translator tool card appears on the homepage grid with appropriate icon and description
Navigation menu includes PDF Translator link
Clicking the tool card or navigation link routes to the PDF translator page

requirements.text: Create a new PDF Translator page component with file upload interface, language selection controls, translation preview, and download functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes FileUploader component for PDF upload
Page provides source and target language selection dropdowns
Page displays the disclaimer about image text translation
Page shows translation progress or status
Page provides download button for the translated PDF

constraints: Maintain consistency with existing red-themed UI design
Follow existing file upload patterns used in other PDF tool pages
Use the same layout structure as other PDF converter pages
nonGoals: Real-time translation preview of individual pages
OCR for extracting text from images within PDFs
Support for translating scanned PDFs with embedded images
Custom language pair mappings or translation quality settings

required: Translation or language icon for PDF translator tool card on homepage (translate-icon.dim_128x128.png)
